titlealts.searchtitle: Data Set: CDS V6-2 Type 170 - Admitted Patient Care - Detained and or Long Term Psychiatric Census CDS - Specification

entry.p: Data Group: CDS V6-2 Type 001 - CDS Interchange Header

p.b: To define the mandatory identity and addressing information for a Commissioning Data Set submission.

p.xref: CDS V6-2 Type 001 - CDS Interchange Header

entry.p: One per Interchange submitted to the Secondary_Uses_Service.
Multiple Commissioning Data Set Messages may be submitted in a single Commissioning Data Set Interchange.
Data Group: CDS V6-2 Type 003 - CDS Message Header

p.b: To define the mandatory identity and addressing information for a Commissioning Data Set submission.

p.xref: CDS V6-2 Type 003 - CDS Message Header

entry.p: One per Commissioning Data Set Message submitted to the Secondary_Uses_Service.
Multiple Commissioning Data Set Messages may be submitted in a single Commissioning Data Set Interchange.

p.b: One of the following options must be used:

entry.p: Data Group: CDS V6-2 Type 005N - CDS Transaction Header Group - Net Change Protocol

p.b: To carry Commissioning Data Set identification and addressing data and other data indicating the specific use of one of the Net Change Update Mechanism of the Commissioning Data Set Submission Protocol.

p.xref: CDS V6-2 Type 005N - CDS Transaction Header Group - Net Change Protocol

entry.p: One per Commissioning Data Set re cord submitted to the Secondary_Uses_Service.
Multiple Commissioning Data Set Messages may be submitted in a single Commissioning Data Set Interchange.
Data Group: CDS V6-2 Type 005B - CDS Transaction Header Group - Bulk Update Protocol

p.b: To carry Commissioning Data Set identification and addressing data and other data indicating the specific use of the Bulk Replacement Update Mechanism of the Commissioning Data Set Submission Protocol.

p.xref: CDS V6-2 Type 005B - CDS Transaction Header Group - Bulk Update Protocol

entry.p: One per Commissioning Data Set record submitted to the Secondary_Uses_Service.
Multiple Commissioning Data Set Messages may be submitted in a single Commissioning Data Set Interchange.

p.b: To carry the details of the Patient Pathway.
To carry the Identity of the Patient. See Note S3 in Commissioning Data Set Business Rules.
One of the following DATA GROUPS must be used:
Must be used where the Commissioning Data Set record has been anonymised
Must be used where the NHS NUMBER STATUS INDICATOR CODE
Must be used for all other values of the NHS NUMBER STATUS INDICATOR CODE
To carry the characteristics of the Patient.
To carry the psychiatric characteristics of the Patient.

entry.p: Data Group: HOSPITAL PROVIDER SPELL - ADMISSION CHARACTERISTICS

p.b: To carry the admission details of the Hospital Provider Spell containing the Episode.

entry.p: Data Group: CONSULTANT EPISODE ACTIVITY CHARACTERISTICS

p.b: To carry the details of the Consultant Episode on the Census Date.

entry.p: Data Group: DATA GROUP: CONSULTANT EPISODE- OVERSEAS VISITOR STATUS GROUP

p.b: To carry the details of the Overseas Visitor Status of the Patient during the Episode.
To carry the details of the Service Agreement.

entry.p: Data Group: CONSULTANT EPISODE - PERSON GROUP (CONSULTANT)

p.b: To carry the details of the Responsible Care Professional.

entry.p: Data Group: CONSULTANT EPISODE - CLINICAL DIAGNOSIS GROUP (ICD)

p.b: To carry the details of the ICD coded Clinical Diagnoses.

entry.p: Data Group: CONSULTANT EPISODE - CLINICAL DIAGNOSIS GROUP (READ)

p.b: To carry the details of the READ coded Clinical Diagnoses.

entry.p: Data Group: LOCATION GROUP (AT START OF EPISODE)

p.b: To carry the details of the Location at the Start Of Episode.

entry.p: Data Group: LOCATION GROUP (WARD STAY AT PSYCHIATRIC CENSUS DATE)

p.b: To carry the details of the Location of the Ward Stay at the Psychiatric Census Date.
To carry the Patient's General Medical Practitioner and the General Practice details.
To carry the details of the Referrer.

entry.p: Data Group: ELECTIVE ADMISSION LIST ENTRY

p.b: To carry the details of the Elective Admission List Entry.

entry.p: Data Group: CDS V6-2 Type 004 - CDS Message Trailer

p.b: To define the mandatory identity and addressing information for a Commissioning Data Set submission.

p.xref: CDS V6-2 Type 004 - CDS Message Trailer

entry.p: One per Commissioning Data Set Message submitted to the Secondary_Uses_Service.
Multiple Commissioning Data Set Messages may be submitted in a single Commissioning Data Set Interchange.
Data Group: CDS V6-2 Type 002 - CDS Interchange Trailer

p.b: To define the mandatory identity and addressing information for a Commissioning Data Set submission.

p.xref: CDS V6-2 Type 002 - CDS Interchange Trailer
CDS V6-2 Type 002 - Commissioning Data Set Interchange Trailer

entry.p: One per Interchange submitted to the Secondary_Uses_Service.
Multiple Commissioning Data Set Messages may be submitted in a single Commissioning Data Set Interchange.
